edge: The First Order has risen from the fallen Galactic Empire and seeks to end the New Republic.
Leia searches for her twin brother, Luke Skywalker,
Poe receives a map to Luke's location from BB-8.
First Order stormtroopers commanded by Kylo Ren arrive and capture Poe.
Stormtrooper FN-2187, disillusioned with the First Order, saves Poe.
Kylo tortures Poe using the Force and learns of BB-8. Stormtrooper FN-2187, disillusioned with the First Order, saves Poe.
Reys, Finn, and BB-8 steal the Millennium Falcon and escape Jakku.
FN-2187 assumes Poe was killed after finding his jacket in the wreck.
Rey, Finn, and BB-8 steal the Millennium Falcon and escape Jakku. Rey, Finn, and BB-8 encounter each other.
A First Order Star Destroyer shoots them, and they crash-land.
Han Solo discovered and boarded the Falcon.

node_2: gangs seeking to settle debts with han
edge: Gangs seeking to settle debts with Han attacked the Falcon but the group escaped in it.
Luke attempted to rebuild the Jedi Order.
An apprentice turned to the dark side, destroyed Luke's temple, and slaughtered the other apprentices.
Rey experiences a childhood memory of a ship leaving her on Jakku.
Maz offers help getting BB-8 to the Resistance.
The Force draws Rey to a secluded vault.
Maz gives Finn the lightsaber for safekeeping.
Rey finds Anakin Skywalker's lightsaber in a secluded vault.
Maz Kanata owns a cantina.
General Hux requests to use the weapon for the first time on the New Republic and Supreme Leader Snoke approves it.
Snoke questions Kylo's ability to deal with emotions surrounding his father, Han Solo.
destroys the New Republic capital and its four neighboring planets, leaving the Resistance on their own.
The First Order attacks Takodana in search of BB-8.
Rescued by Resistance X-wing fighters led by Poe, who survived the crash.
Arrives at Takodana with C-3PO and reunites with Han.
Captures Rey, having realized that she had seen the map,
Orders Kylo to bring Rey to him.
Escapes using a Jedi mind trick on a stormtrooper guard.
Using the Falcon, Han, Chewbacca, and Finn infiltrate the facility,
Finds Rey, who had been seen by Han.
Confronts Kylo, calling him by his birth-name Ben,
Snoke seems to consider this but ultimately kills Han.
Attack and destroy the base's thermal oscillator.
Kylo pursues Rey and Finn into the woods and incapacitates Rey.
While trying to escape with Rey, Finn gets defeated by Kylo.
Rey awakens and takes the lightsaber from Kylo after defeating him in a duel.
Snoke orders Hux to evacuate and bring Kylo to him to complete his training.
Chewbacca saves Rey and the injured Finn from Kylo's clutches.
While trying to escape with Rey, Finn gets defeated by Kylo.
Rey finds Luke atop a cliff on a remote island and presents him with his lightsaber.
